mobileAppsData.description: Track every aspect of your domestic and international flights. Check gate numbers, delays, and cancellations, and get updates on your flight status.
mobileAppsData.title: FlightTrack

mobileAppsData.description: Translate text in over 40 languages and send the translations via email or SMS.
mobileAppsData.title: ProTranslate

mobileAppsData.description: Translate between more than 45 languages using Google Translation services. Country flag icons make it easy to identify languages.
mobileAppsData.title: Translate!

mobileAppsData.description: A handy translation tool that allows you to translate words and even sentences in English, Spanish, Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, and Turkish.
mobileAppsData.title: Worldwide Translator

mobileAppsData.description: Find and book hotel properties worldwide. You can easily search for hotels in a specific destination or use GPS to find hotels near your current location.
mobileAppsData.title: HotelsByMe - Hotels & Hotel Reservations

mobileAppsData.description: Know ahead of time if your flight is likely to be delayed. Powered by FlightCaster.com, this app uses machine learning techniques and historical data to predict potential flight delays.
mobileAppsData.title: FlightPredictor

mobileAppsData.description: Always know what time it is anywhere in the world. Whendle creates and organizes clocks for your favorite locations in a list and on a world map.
mobileAppsData.title: Whendle

mobileAppsData.description: Save flights to your "My Flights" list, then receive real-time flight status notifications on your Palm webOS phone. Even add flights directly to the calendar on your phone and view maps of flights that are currently in-air.
mobileAppsData.title: FlightView

mobileAppsData.description: Keep track of gas mileage by entering numbers from the pump and the odometer each time you fill up. The summary of fuel efficiency helps you keep an eye on your engine.
mobileAppsData.title: Mileage Monitor

mobileAppsData.description: Access maps for the Washington, D.C., Metrorail and Metrobus (Central and Pentagon area) as well as the Baltimore Metro Subway and Maryland MARC train and Light Rail.
mobileAppsData.title: TMaps-DC

mobileAppsData.description: Easily convert 40 of the world´s most widely used currencies from one to another. Currency Converter uses the Yahoo! Finance service to obtain live exchange rates.
mobileAppsData.title: Currency Converter

mobileAppsData.description: Translate between 45 languages with just a tap, using Google<sup>™</sup> translation services. After you've translated the text, you can send it directly through Email or Messaging.
mobileAppsData.title: Translator

mobileAppsData.description: Access transit maps for the Philadelphia metropolitan area, including the entire Septa system, Center City, the Broad Street and Market-Frankford lines, Trolley service, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: TMaps-Philly

mobileAppsData.description: Caltrain commuters in the Bay Area can find out when the next two trains are leaving the station for their destination and get updates about delays from the Caltrain Twitter feed.
mobileAppsData.title: FMCaltrain

mobileAppsData.description: Create, manage, and find GPS waypoints. Import lists or create new ones. Integrate waypoints into Google Maps for driving directions. The paid version includes waypoint notifications and more.
mobileAppsData.title: Go To Tool

mobileAppsData.description: You're here. Your friends are out there. Find a place to meet in the middle. Mezzoman works with Google Maps and Yelp to find businesses and locations between any three points.
mobileAppsData.title: Mezzoman

mobileAppsData.description: Want to tell someone where you are, but you're not sure of the address? Here I Am finds your current location and sends your contact a text or email.
mobileAppsData.title: Here I Am

mobileAppsData.description: Carry this GPS-based compass with you so you can get your bearings and know what direction you're headed.
mobileAppsData.title: Compass

mobileAppsData.description: Always know where you parked your car. Log the location of the parking spot with GPS and then get directions back to it if you need them.
mobileAppsData.title: Parking Place

mobileAppsData.description: Track speed, time, and distance with this GPS navigation app. Ideal for low-acceleration activities like hiking and biking, it also tells you direction and latitude/longitude.
mobileAppsData.title: NavPro

mobileAppsData.description: Text, tweet, or email a map of your current location to let people know where you are.
mobileAppsData.title: Send Map!

mobileAppsData.description: Use this geo-bookmarking app to quickly save and categorize your favorite locations, restaurants, stores, and more. Get directions from Google Maps and share your location via email.
mobileAppsData.title: Flare

mobileAppsData.description: Find where you want to go, whether it's a gas station, restaurant, or market. Using Google Maps and your phone's GPS, Locate-A-Rama can find just about anything.
mobileAppsData.title: Locate-A-Rama

mobileAppsData.description: Avoid speed traps, red light cameras, and other roadway wallet hazards. The app gives you a spoken warning as you approach a potential ticket, such as "live police" or "speed camera."
mobileAppsData.title: Trapster

mobileAppsData.description: Find out when the next commuter train departs without having to go through a lot of steps. Schedules automatically update every minute. Currently covers the New Jersey Transit system.
mobileAppsData.title: CommuterComputer

mobileAppsData.description: This app for aviators provides partial NOAA ADDS aviation data service access, simple flight-leg planning, DUATS flight briefing and flight-plan filling, and more.
mobileAppsData.title: FlightBriefer
